Articles.Content: What are you Afraid of. Im afraid of Silence because it is just weird and you dont expect loud noises to happen and when they do You jump and scream And everyone stares at you like ...

Th scariest though I've ever had was the laughable idea that I might, some day, run out of bacon. *fake laugh* Yes. A world without bacon. Might as well remove protons while we're at it. *has horrible nightmares for a week*
Everything.

Everything.

interesting

That I will make the wrong choices and end up becoming an adult I didn't want to become, living a life I didn't want to live.

Spiders too. Those bastards

That I will make the wrong choices and end up becoming an adult I didn't want to become, living a life I didn't want to live.

Spiders too. Those bastards

YES!!! i hate those

In all seriousness, my greatest fear is probably having my mind altered (drugs, sci-fi mind control, anything that causes me to lose control of me). The idea of my brain, me, being adjusted by some outside force terrifies me. For the same reason, I have nightmares every time somebody is killed by a head injury in a movie. A shot to the chest kills your heart. A shot to the head kills the thing that contains you.
Sleep paralysis terrifies me, as does losing my ability to think

FNAF animatronics.

Bonnie.

YUJUMPSCARE?

FNAF animatronics.

Bonnie.

YUJUMPSCARE?

i dont play freddys

I've played all the resident evil games, F.E.A.R. 1 and 2, slender, amnesia, many other horror games.

IS THE WORST THING I HAVE EVER EXPERIENCED. I had friends over to play it, one actually played while I watched and held a pillow to my chest while sitting in the fetal position. We screamed like 6 times, the times in between filled with horrifying tension. I had to sleep with the lights on for a few days, and kept checking behind the shower curtain. I'm 22.

[h=1]Ophidiophobia[/h]
I'm slightly scared of things like the dark but I've ended up confronting most of my major fears and getting rid of them.

Anthophobia.

Believe me it is horrible when your classmates find out about it (especially those gossipy ones) and you discover those are covered and are a major topic in you assessments.

I am scared of spiders, much but not to the point of -phobia. <-very hard to get rid of

I don't think there is much else though
Cockroaches

[h=1]Ophidiophobia[/h]

This is a rather uncomfortable photo for me, too, but I can tolerate it. You?

Anthophobia.

Believe me it is horrible when your classmates find out about it (especially those gossipy ones) and you discover those are covered and are a major topic in you assessments.

You must be terrified of this photo, right?

This is a rather uncomfortable photo for me, too, but I can tolerate it. You?

The idea of seeing a curled up snake right in front of me is most uncomfortable - this here tickles my neck a bit, because my brain stem has to be constantly reminded of the invention of photography and that it is not a real situation.

You must be terrified of this photo, right?

Now, you picked quite an example here ... the way they lean in to look right at you ...

Mr Lajos, are we a little a$$ today?

Sometimes i'm terrified to realize the options other people have. -source: xkcd

I'm afraid that at some point my mind would become too weak to learn some new concepts or knowledge. I'm afraid that I won't be able to pass everything I know to my children before I die. I'm afraid to live to see the day when the mankind would turn into a bunch of dumb freaks and I wouldn't be able to change anything about it. That would be all I am currently afraid of.

The idea of seeing a curled up snake right in front of me is most uncomfortable - this here tickles my neck a bit, because my brain stem has to be constantly reminded of the invention of photography and that it is not a real situation.

Its eyes are rather uncanny. That reptile stare, lacking neocortical emotions, with those weird pupils.

Now, you picked quite an example here ... the way they lean in to look right at you ...

Mr Lajos, are we a little a$$ today?

Why yes, we are.

Here's some more weird flowers.

http://www.lifebuzz.com/similar-flowers/

This might also be scary for some people. Although not flowers, but leaves, they look rather uncanny.

That's why we have klunatik channel to make us feel better.

https://www.youtube.com/user/klunatik
